name: yun-sonic-acts
description: 1) open the terminal and `cd` to a folder where you want to download the files 2) run `git clone https://github.com/StefKors/Yun-Sonic-Acts.git` or download from here https://github.com/StefKors/Yun-Sonic-Acts/archive/master.zip 3) run `cd Yun-Sonic-Acts` 4) run `gulp`
author: Stef Kors
